title: Drawing, "Sketches of Soldiers and Two Artillery horses", 1862
inscribed:
Recto: Inscribed in graphite, at?: Blue
Verso: Inscribed in graphite, at?: Red
creditline: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
description:
Recto: Vertical sketch of a group of trees partially drawn over accounts and a soldier leading a horse.
Verso: Horizontal sketches of a soldier and two artillery horses, and in opposite direction, hasty sketches of soldiers marching.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sketches of Soldiers and Two Artillery horses", 1862.
1862. Graphite on paper. Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.. 1912-12-183.
